subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Miroslav Satan had a goal and an assist, and Rick DiPietro stopped 36 shots in the Islanders’ 3-1 victory against the Pittsburgh Penguins on Friday.
snippet: Miroslav Satan had a goal and an assist, and Rick DiPietro stopped 36 shots in the Islanders’ 3-1 victory against the Pittsburgh Penguins on Friday.
